channel.title: [Javac Error] 562 Compiler! Help!
channel.description:
Hey, im running a 562 compiler, i've changed the destination to my correct Java destination ect... BUT this comes up, i've never used 562 and not so sure what to get, PS its 562 HD/LD Heres my Compiler
@echo off cd . "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause
And this is what i get once i run it..
src\Applet_Sub1.java:20: error while writing Applet_Sub1: bin\Applet_Sub1.class (Access is denied) public abstract class Applet_Sub1 extends Applet ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: [Javac Error] 562 Compiler! Help!
item.dc:creator: @tidus44 tidus44
item.description:
@tidus44 wrote:

Hey, im running a 562 compiler, i’ve changed the destination to my correct Java destination ect… BUT this comes up, i’ve never used 562 and not so sure what to get, PS its 562 HD/LD

Heres my Compiler

@echo off cd . "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar; -deprecation -d bin -sourcepath src src/*.java pause

And this is what i get once i run it…

src\Applet_Sub1.java:20: error while writing Applet_Sub1: bin\Applet_Sub1.class (Access is denied) public abstract class Applet_Sub1 extends Applet ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
